Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes a temporary moratorium on unfunded mandates and makes permanent the tax cap
Summary: Prohibits the enactment of unfunded mandates for a period of three years; instructs the state comptroller to conduct a report on the annual fiscal impact enacted state legislation has on the revenues and expenses of local municipalities; and makes permanent the tax cap.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law and the executive law, in relation to establishing a temporary moratorium on unfunded mandates; and to amend chapter 97 of the laws of 2011, amending the general municipal law and the education law relating to establishing limits upon school district and local government tax levies, in relation to making permanent the tax cap and making permanent certain provisions thereof
